name: Ultimate dwarf beer fest
description:
This is a game about a dwarf trying his best at his bar.

Controls:

  • Press R to start the game
  • Use WASD to move
  • Press F to consume the drink
  • Press TAB to open the recipe menu
  • In order to complete a drink, don't forget to add some water!

This game was made for the #CozyAutumnGameJam2022 using Godot engine https://godotengine.org/  by:

https://github.com/hatpingu - tile artist

https://github.com/ngv9 - item assets artist

https://github.com/RomBurunduk - artist

@Shigud - developer

Big thanks for providing free assets for the game:

https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii - NPC sprites

https://elthen.itch.io/pixel-art-dwarf-sprites - dwarf sprite

https://mounirtohami.itch.io/pixel-art-gui-elements - gui

https://makotohiramatsu.itch.io/rainy-day-ambience - rainy ambience

https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle - music
